bookingNumber.description: A unique identifier assigned to the shipment booking, used for tracking and reference. They are often referred to as 'Booking Reference', 'Booking No.', or 'Our Reference'.

contractNumber.description: It's a contract number between the carrier and Forto Logistics SE & Co KG. It can be found as Service Contract/Rate Reff. No. Shipment Id 'S' followed by 6, 7, or 8 digits e.g. S9486358 is not a contract number.

pickUpTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal for cargo pickup during the import shipment.

gateInTerminalCode.description: The specific terminal where cargo is gated in especially Export terminal delivery address. It can be found as GATE IN AT TERMINAL/DEPOT

proformaDate.description: The date considered to apply the rates and charges specified in the booking confirmation. It is mentioned as Price Calculation Date or proforma Date.

cyCutOff.description: The datetime by which the cargo to be delivered to the Container Yard. It can be found with keys CUT-OFF(Date/Time), FCL DG delivery cut-off, CY CUT OFF, CY Closing.

gateInReference.description: A reference code for cargo entering the terminal to drop the loaded cargo for Export. Sometimes it can be 'Booking Number'.

mblNumber.description: Bill of Lading number (B/L NO.), a document issued by the carrier.

pickUpReference.description: A reference code for cargo pickup during the import shipment. Sometimes it can be 'Our Reference'.

siCutOff.description: The deadline datetime for submitting the Shipping Instructions (SI) to the carrier. It can be found with keys Shipping Instruction Closing.

vgmCutOff.description: The deadline datetime for submitting the Verified Gross Mass (VGM) to the carrier. It can be found with keys VGM DEADLINE, VGM DUE, VGM CUT OFF.

containerType.description: The size / type of the container, such as 20ft, 40ft, 40HC, 40 DRY, 20DC etc under Type/Size column.

pickUpDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be picked up. It is identified as PICK UP AT DEPOT, Empty Container Depot, or Export Empty Pick Up Depot(s). Do not extract the address here.

dropOffDepotCode.description: The depot code where the empty container will be dropped off.

eta.description: Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) is the expected date when the shipment will arrive at its destination.

etd.description: Estimated Time of Departure (ETD) is the expected date when the shipment will leave the origin port.

imoNumber.description: The International Maritime Organization number for a specific leg. It can be found as IMO No, IMO number.

portOfDischarge.description: The port where the goods are discharged from the vessel. This is the destination port for the shipment. It can be found at POD, Port of Discharge, To, Discharge Port

portOfLoading.description: The port where the goods are loaded onto the vessel. This is the origin port for the shipment. It can be found at POL, Port of Loading, From, Load Port

vesselName.description: The name of the vessel carrying the shipment. It can be found at vessel, INTENDED VESSEL/VOYAGE

voyage.description: The journey or route taken by the vessel for a specific leg. It can be found at Voyage Number

carrierAddress.description: The address of the carrier who provides service and issued the document.

carrierName.description: The name of the carrier who issued the document. Extract full name e,g, MSC or MSC POLAND SP. Z O.O. rather than just MSC.
